official_title: Erector Spinae Regional Anesthesia for Pain Control in the Emergency Department
inclusion_criteria:
* Posterior/lateral rib or vertebral fractures
* Pancreatitis or pancreatic cancer
* Renal colic
* Back pain
Healthy volunteers allowed
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusion_criteria:
* Unstable vitals
* Infection or open wound over insertion site
* Prior allergic reaction to local anesthetic
* Pregnant females
* Patients <18 years old
* Altered mentation
